name: gumfish
text: Man, older achewood strips were a lot more punchline-based.

name: dougthehead
text: Yeah, but this one had two punchlines- The cable company picking up the phone the second Teodor walked into the bathroom, and Phillipe mis-hearing Teodor.  I think this strip is at least a 4.

name: dovey
text: A strip gets a 4 for me if it produces an audible chuckle. This strip is a 4.

name: deimosrising
text: Once upon a time Phillipe's mouth was horrifying even when closed.

name: ambala
text: Today's Phillipe does not understand this joke.

name: daidai
text:
Phillipe doesn't understand it here, either.

He is just sad because he can't find Teodor, like a dog who follows you around a room.

name: em2
text: ...And it seems like he kind of breaks the 4th wall with a "stare directly at the camera during the punchline" move.

name: howl
text:
that is strange. I saw him as looking downwards sadly but now I can also see him looking out at me and it is strange.

This is why God did not make us with vertical lines for eyes.

name: gitarooman
text: Phillipe is completely not looking at the 'camera'. Look at the way his body is angled, he's staring down the hall and listening through the door. I can't even see how you can see that.

name: xaxx
text: Surely you've seen enough of Achewood, or at least artisticly-simple comics, to know that characters are always front-facing, partially.  You almost never get a straight-on view or profile view.  Hmm, in the course of writing this reply, I noticed that Teodor in the second panel is simply a mirrored image of himself in the first panel.

name: billyamericana
text: What's funny is T's still on hold.

name: amberjunk
text: Yeah I totally didn't think that little Phillipe would understand...

name: mortshire
text: CAPS LOCK IS ALWAYS COMEDY.

name: jokercross
text: CAPS LOCK IS CRUISE CONTROL FOR COOL.

name: max
text: A comment left by max was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Nurdbot, Jesler729, plummet, Siah, Doc_Rostov)

name: sankster
text: BUT EVEN CRUISE CONTROL NEEDS STEERING.

name: scraggg
text: OR ELSE YOU WILL BE KILLED.

name: dusty
text: nicely done guys. This reminded me of one f those PSAs with a group of athletes or the cast of a show where they each say part of the message.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: Erectile dysfunction tech support? Where's Ray, this'll make a mint!

name: dovey
text: Goddamnit Ray can still sport wood why won't you believe a guy

name: everything_is_a_hat
text: someday, my bathroom walls will consist of nothing but Achewood bathroom jokes.

name: tetrisattack
text: A comment left by tetrisattack was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Dovey, Deusoma, BrianNotBrian, Siah, Darthemed)

name: curdledboy
text: The baby otter is sad for the teddy's problems.

name: mausmausmausmaus
text: Modemtown sounds like a rad BBS

name: padijun
text: Now honestly, we've all done this on long tech support holds

name: norrin
text: If you make me wait an inordinate amount of time, you may have to talk to me while I drop a deuce. It's only fair.

name: killerlimpet
text:
"I'm sorry about the wait."
"It's okay. You had a kickin' elevator-music cover of Comfortably Numb playing."
(actual dialog on Apple tech support)

name: dybrar
text: God I did not mean to lame this. Why I gotta experience chubby dysfunction all the damn time?

name: atticusonline
text: Phillipe is worried about Teodor's penis.

name: twoply
text: I would like to think that in the 4th panel Phillipe would have counseled T.

name: son_of_selleck
text: oh man, why do i find this so hilarious?

name: relaxing
text: EVERY. DAMN. TIME.

name: gumfish
text: The next public toilet I visit is getting "OH HI. YEAH. IT HASN'T BEEN UP IN THREE DAYS" scrawled on the wall.

name: bjorntd
text: I'm withholding my chubby  until I see photographic evidence of this.

name: shutup_shutup
text: This strip is ALL ABOUT a withheld chubby!

name: vice
text: Teodor should know that the very act of saying "They're not going to pick up in the next few minutes" Practically ENSURES they will pick up in the next minute or two.

name: ashoykh
text: i know how teodor feels.

name: saulbellow
text:
\b/------\b/-------------\b/--------\b/
/b\--/b\---------/b\---------/b\-------

Attack of the flying b's!

Or just really weird tablature

name: l_c_b
text: Oh, I've been there. Wait ages for the tech support people for my ISP to pick up, the second I have to go to the bathroom they're getting ready to talk with me. Plus, my phone was not cordless so that led to some other problems.

name: rbisme
text: phillipes frowns for teodore inability

name: farqussus
text: says local man

name: ganymedeio
text: HAHAHA.

name: memehaver
text: Let's see... how many wiener jokes is that in this first week's worth of strips?

name: hamscout
text:
I've done this. I was calling to cancel my crappy insurance company.
I flushed...

...and I let him hear it...

name: wonelove
text:
Usually when they tell you they might record your call is when they pick up the phone...

isn't it?

name: sparhawk
text: It's Ctrl-Alt-Del by way of ursine erectile dysfunction!

name: wonglers
text:
Ohhhh I get it...
Philippe is still high as balls and thinks the key hole is talking. Took me a while.

name: achewhat
text: I think for those of us that don't know that Phillipe is a 5 year old river otter or even a river otter at all, this strip makes me laugh. Nothing like a bit of toilet humour. Anyway, look at his shape.

name: howl
text: He is a sea otter.

name: mattboy
text: Not the first time Philippe will be shocked but a very good shock/despaired face!

name: atticusonline
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: notcool
text: I appreciate the whole Garfield Minus Garfield thing you're doing here, but I'm afraid that on more than a few strips, it's going to eventually sputter out. I don't know what you're going to do after The Party.

name: atticusonline
text: I only made 2 or 3 anyway

name: valorgigo
text: Well done

name: spaceandrew
text: I liked them a lot. Let my imagination run wild with possible captions!

name: nicolettesue
text:
Phillipe looks so concerned for Teodor.

We are all concerned, Phillipe You are not alone.
